result.arabic_text: فَتَلَقَّىٰٓ ءَادَمُ مِن رَّبِّهِۦ كَلِمَٰتٖ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
result.translation: Aadamis Gooftaa isaa irraa jechoota fudhatee, sana booda [Rabbiin] dhiifama isaaf godhe. Dhugumatti, Inni (Rabbiin) Isatu akkaan tawbaa qeebalaa, akkaan rahmata godhaadha.
